discussion.title: How to reduce the startup time of model
discussion.body:
Hi, 
Thank you for taking your time and take a look for my question.

My dataset is kinda large with  20 features and 1000000+ point.  And I have set that `parallelism=:multiprocessing` and `numprocs=20` and `batch=True` and `batch_size=10000` and `turbo=True`. But it takes forever to wait before the symbolic regression actually starts. The script stuck at :
`Info: Copying definition of mse_loss to workers...`
`Info: Finished! `

How could I faster the startup with large dataset.

Thank you

nodes.body: Can you downsample the dataset? Normally symbolic regression doesnâ€™t need so much data to converge
